trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações de qualificação para um método de retorno de chamada quando uma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de alteração que ocorreu no status de presença de um par.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref> object containing data that specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref>objeto que contém dados que especifica o tipo de alteração que ocorreu no status de presença de um par.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> na qual as informações de presença foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> specified by <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A> is not associated with a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, this value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>especificado por <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A>não está associado com um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, esse valor é `null`.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>objeto associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> na qual as informações de presença foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> na qual as informações de presença foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>em que as informações de presença foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the changed presence information of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> as well as a string provided by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref> describing the updated presence status.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as informações de presença alteradas de um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> , bem como uma cadeia de caracteres fornecida pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"> </xref> que descreve o status atualizado de presença.

trans-unit.source: Changed presence information for <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> and a string describing the updated presence status.
trans-unit.target: Alterar informações de presença de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> e uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve o status atualizado de presença.
